main.name: Barrett Lowe
main.description: I specialize in C++ and Python development with interests in home automation, computer vision, IOT, machine learning, and cloud-based solutions
main.bio: I'm C++/Python developer and have worked on a range of products and packages from guided missiles to hoist safety and control systems. My wife, Brandie, and I live in Fort Worth and recently welcomed our first child into the world! During my free time, you can find me in the woodshop building something or on the computer managing and improving our 'smart home' with the open source project Home Assistant.
main.contactmessage: If you're interested, please feel free to contact me below. Thank you!

resume.skillmessage: I'm most experienced in C++ and Python. I've used many other technologies but the ones listed below are my strongest.

education.description: Researched artificial intelligence algorithms, primarily decision trees and bootstrapped learning.

publications.title: Multispectral Image Analysis Using Random Forest
publications.author: Barrett Lowe and Arun D. Kulkarni

publications.title: Random Forest Algorithm for Land Cover Classification
publications.author: Arun D. Kulkarni and Barrett Lowe

education.school: University of North Carolina at Greensboro

work.title: Embedded Software Engineer
work.description: Developing embedded safety systems for hoists and hoist controllers. Secondary responsibilities include automated testing of software, automated builds and deployment to quality assurance team and maintaining various development servers (jenkins, department wiki, automated test area warning signs, etc).

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developed software for the F35 virtual cockpit including environmental graphics, weapon systems simulation, pilot-vehicle interface, and player networking.

work.title: Systems Engineer
work.description: Developed software architecture and guidance/tracking systems for hypersonic and supersonic missiles. Assisted with transformation of build system for fast feedback including Ganglia and SLURM grid optimization.
